about.title: About EasyReserv
about.paragraph1: We started with a simple question: why is online booking so complicated? When we connected the first form to a restaurant, we realized that booking is just the tip of the iceberg. The links between bookings, POS, kitchen, inventory, accounting and reports were missing.
about.paragraph2: That's how EasyReserv was born: an All-in-One platform that brings everything together — bookings and waitlist, fiscal POS, orders & KDS, inventory & recipe costing (COGS), real-time reports and automation. We built it for real teams, with go-live in days, not months, integration with 1C and payments, without changing hardware.
about.paragraph3: Today we optimize operations in diverse industries: restaurants and cafes, beauty salons & barbershops, hotels & guesthouses, car rentals, fitness & wellness, medical and retail. Our mission remains the same: fewer systems, fewer errors, better decisions on real data – so you sell more and your team works smarter.

faq_section.title: What is EasyReserv?
faq_section.description: EasyReserv is an All-in-One platform for reservations, fiscal POS, orders/KDS, inventory & recipes, real-time reports and automations. It is built on industry-optimized workflows (restaurants, cafes/kiosks, beauty, hotels/guesthouses, car rental, fitness, medical, retail) and integrates quickly with 1C, payments and existing hardware.

items.question: Can I access EasyReserv on both web and mobile devices?
items.answer: Yes, EasyReserv is available both as a web application (desktop and tablet) and as a native mobile application for iOS and Android. You can access all platform features from any device, with real-time synchronization between all your devices.

items.question: How long does it take to implement the EasyReserv platform?
items.answer: EasyReserv implementation takes 2-5 days depending on the complexity of your business. Our team assists you at every step: initial setup, data import, team training and go-live. You don't need to change existing hardware.

items.question: Does EasyReserv integrate with my accounting system?
items.answer: Yes, EasyReserv integrates natively with major accounting systems such as 1C, SAP and other popular solutions. Export of invoices, sales and financial reports is done automatically, eliminating manual data entry.

items.question: Does EasyReserv provide technical support and training for my team?
items.answer: Absolutely! We offer 24/7 technical support via chat, email and phone. At implementation, we include training sessions for the entire team: managers, cashiers, waiters and cooks. Plus access to our knowledge base and video tutorials.

items.question: What devices can I use EasyReserv on?
items.answer: Web (desktop/laptop) and mobile (iOS/Android). We also have dedicated extensions (eg smartwatch for waiters) and support for compatible printers/scanners.

items.question: Do you have fiscal POS available?
items.answer: Yes. EasyReserv POS issues fiscal receipt, supports split bills, discounts, offline mode and multiple printers. Connects with inventory and reports in real time.

items.question: How does it help my industry?
items.answer: We have industry optimizations: from KDS timers and table rotation in restaurants, to subscriptions & bookings in beauty/fitness, room occupancy in hotels, interval pricing in car rental, batches/expiries in medical and barcodes in retail.

items.question: Do I need to change hardware?
items.answer: Usually no. We work with current tablets/PCs and compatible printers. If needed, we recommend models tested by us.

items.question: Does it integrate with 1C and card payments?
items.answer: Yes. Accounting export to 1C, document reconciliation and integration with payment processors (online & at POS), plus SMS/Email for notifications.

items.question: What reports does the platform provide?
items.answer: Sales, margins, table rotation, service times, employee productivity, KPIs by location/period, COGS per recipe, resource utilization (vehicle/room/device) – live.

items.question: How do you reduce no-shows and delays?
items.answer: With automatic confirmations & reminders, waitlist, '5 min remaining' alerts, production timers and notifications for ready/late orders.

items.question: What pricing plans do you have? (eg Restaurants)
items.answer: Subscription per location + add-ons per user/module. For Restaurants: Basic €50, Standard €125, Pro €200, Enterprise on request – all with free trial. (For other industries, plans appear after you select the industry.)

items.question: Is my data safe?
items.answer: Yes. Role-based access, audit log, encryption in transit, regular backups and data export on request. You own your data.

items.question: What support do you provide?
items.answer: Assisted onboarding, team training, priority support via email/chat/phone and working materials (guides & videos).

items.question: Can I easily migrate from another system?
items.answer: Yes. We import menus/services, customers, inventory and essential history from files or through integrations, with checks at pre-go-live.

items.question: Can I start for free?
items.answer: Yes. We offer a trial period on one location so you can test the workflows before contracting.

items.question: Can it be customized for my needs?
items.answer: In addition to standard settings, we have configurable add-ons and automations; for advanced requirements, we offer Enterprise projects.

story.title: Our story
story.paragraph1: One evening in January 2023, Elena Roșca asked the question that sparked it all: "Why is it almost impossible to make an online restaurant reservation in Chisinau?"
story.paragraph2: The answer wasn't "another form". Together with Alexandru Iaroslavschi, we documented step by step what the digital reservation process should look like: from request, confirmation and table allocation, to notifications and automatic availability updates. While mapping the flow, reality hit us: reservation is just the beginning. POS, kitchen (KDS), inventory, accounting and reports lived in separate islands.
story.paragraph3: That's how EasyReserv was born — the idea of a platform that connects reservations to real-time operations, so teams work faster and with fewer errors.
story.timeline_month3_text: We start the web app that centralizes data (in parallel with mobile development).
story.timeline_month8_text: First Mobile App version (beta) for pilot clients.
story.timeline_month13_text: Mobile App in production; in the first 48h, we reach Top 2 rating in its category.
story.timeline_month14_text: Fiscal POS integration: receipt, split bills, discounts, printers.
story.timeline_month18_text: First full-cycle restaurant in the ecosystem (reservations → POS → KDS → inventory → reports) with ~€30,000 additional profit after launch.
story.timeline_month20_text: We expand with KDS & Timers, Inventory & Recipes (COGS), Live Reports, Automations & Notifications and local integrations.
story.who_we_are_text: EasyReserv is an All-in-One platform that unites reservations, POS, orders/KDS, inventory & recipes, real-time reports and automations — plus a public platform for partner listing & B2C booking, so users can discover and book directly. Go-live in days, not months, 1C and payment integration, compatibility with existing hardware.
story.optimizations_text: Restaurants & cafes/kiosks, salons & barbershops, hotels & guesthouses, car rental, fitness & wellness, medical (clinics/offices), retail — each with dedicated workflows and KPIs (KDS timers, subscriptions, interval pricing, resource occupancy, batches/expiries, barcodes, etc.).
story.impact_text: 40 locations in the first year • 4,600+ users • 80,000+ notifications/month • 30%+ optimized time for teams • 99.9% uptime.
story.mission_text: To simplify operations and increase profitability by connecting reservations to daily processes and automating the repetitive, with real-time visibility for data-driven decisions — not assumptions.

what_is.title: What is EasyReserv?
what_is.description: EasyReserv is a complete solution for managing and optimizing your business. Mobile reservations, employee management, business reports, inventory management and many other features are available. You can save time, increase sales, improve customer experience, reduce costs and increase productivity using our platform.

faq.question: Can I access EasyReserv on both web and mobile devices?
faq.answer: Yes, EasyReserv is available both as a web application (desktop and tablet) and as a native mobile application for iOS and Android. You can access all platform features from any device, with real-time synchronization between all your devices.

faq.question: How long does it take to implement the EasyReserv platform?
faq.answer: EasyReserv implementation takes 2-5 days depending on the complexity of your business. Our team assists you at every step: initial setup, data import, team training and go-live. You don't need to change existing hardware.

faq.question: Does EasyReserv integrate with my accounting system?
faq.answer: Yes, EasyReserv integrates natively with major accounting systems such as 1C, SAP and other popular solutions. Export of invoices, sales and financial reports is done automatically, eliminating manual data entry.

faq.question: Does EasyReserv provide technical support and training for my team?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer 24/7 technical support via chat, email and phone. At implementation, we include training sessions for the entire team: managers, cashiers, waiters and cooks. Plus access to our knowledge base and video tutorials.

hardware.android_important_desc: Integration with Android tablets is essential for modern restaurants. It reduces waiting time, eliminates communication errors and increases customer satisfaction through fast and accurate orders.
hardware.cta_description: Our team can help you choose and configure the right equipment for your business.
